header: BRIEF-Markforged announces series C funding from Siemens' next47, Microsoft Ventures, Porsche SE
body: * Markforged - next47, Siemens-backed venture firm, led round, with Microsoft Ventures, and Porsche Automobil Holding SE also making investments​ Source text for Eikon:

header: BRIEF-Microsoft and Attunity announce strategic partnership
body: * With strategic partnership, co is working with Microsoft to offer new product, Attunity Replicate for Microsoft Migrations Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
